tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    designer TEXT
)
fashion_events_table (event_id INT PRIMARY KEY, event_name VARCHAR(255), event_date DATE, location VARCHAR(255), organizer VARCHAR(255), event_description TEXT)
industry_news_table (news_id INT PRIMARY KEY, news_title VARCHAR(255), news_date DATE, news_source VARCHAR(255), news_content TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fashion_events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name TEXT,
  event_date DATE,
  event_location TEXT,
  event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS runway_shows (
  show_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id UUID REFERENCES fashion_events(event_id),
  designer_name TEXT,
  show_date DATE,
  show_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE runway_shows (
  show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  designer VARCHAR(255),
  theme VARCHAR(255),
  duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE editorial_coverage (
  coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  news_id INT,
  event_id INT,
  coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
  coverage_description TEXT
);
